basic.description: This course reviews mathematical background material that will be needed throughout the program.  We will use the fundamental analytical framework of maximum likelihood estimation to motivate a review of basic probability concepts, likelihood functions, Bayesian analysis, linear algebra, and linear and nonlinear optimization.  The focus will be on estimation of linear and nonlinear models that are often required for management analytics applications.
basic.subject: MMA
basic.title: Mathematical Foundations for Analytics
